about_the_game:
A massive, mysterious storm has obliterated civilization. In the city of survivors, you are the only veteran engineer capable of navigating the old tracks. Gather clues to uncover the storm's secrets, manage your train and resources, and survive in a world plagued by raiders and harsh environments.

Beware, what lies hidden in the darkness may not always be to your liking.


Manage Your Train

Keep your unstable train running. Strategically place vehicles in limited space and ensure you have enough resources. Prepare for fuel shortages, frequent breakdowns, and chronic power outages.

Explore a Ruined World

Venture into a procedurally generated world where you’ll encounter various events in extreme conditions. Investigate different structures across the world to earn rewards, trade with merchants, or resort to raiding. But always be quick—the storm is closing in on you!


Prepare for Battle

Gear up for chases with raiders. Strategically place defensive structures and maintain control during combat situations. You’ll also face massive enemies that occasionally block your path!

Grow Through Game Over

Use research points from previous expeditions to unlock new items and engines. Experiment with new combinations to build ad train uniquely yours.


Uncover the Secret of the Storm

What secrets lie within the storms that destroyed human civilization? Uncover the conspiracy behind the storm's occurrence and find clues to confront the great disaster!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Gen7 Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia geforce gtx 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Gen10 Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia geforce gtx 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: As a veteran train operator, you must manage the train. What decisions will you make to confront the enemies? Command the train in real-time as it desperately crosses through the chaos of the storm. Manage resources and the train to survive the treacherous tracks and make it to the end.
